original_text: Every man shall give as he is able, according to the blessing of the Lord thy God which he hath given thee.
korean_text: 각 사람이 네 하나님 여호와께서 주신 복을 따라 그 힘대로 드릴지니라

sentences.original_text: Every man shall give as he is able
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 사람은 자기 능력에 따라 드릴지니

sentences.original_text: according to the blessing of the Lord thy God
sentences.korean_translation: 네 하나님 여호와께서 네게 주신 복을 따라
